sentences.english: Zhigung Celestial Burial Ground has masters who are monks with Zhigungti Monastery of the Garyu Sect.
sentences.chinese: 直贡天葬场有来自噶举派直贡替寺的喇嘛天葬师。

sentences.english: In 1993 the monks of the Karma Kagyu tradition had a candidate of their own choice.
sentences.chinese: 1993年噶玛噶举派的僧侣们有了自己的候选人。

sentences.english: The first is the contradiction between the Karma Kagyu faction and conflict.
sentences.chinese: 首先是噶玛噶举派之间的矛盾和冲突。

sentences.english: The Karmapa is leader of a Tibetan Buddhist tradition known as the Karma Kagyu.
sentences.chinese: 喀玛巴是藏传佛教噶玛噶举派的领袖。

sentences.english: The silver box is most likely to be a holy item of the Karmah Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 这件玲珑精致的银盒应是藏传佛教噶举派的圣物。
